channel.title: Do you need runserver or compile? also connection help
channel.description:
Ok i tryed to get my port to go through, i even had good moparscape coders use remote access and try to make my computer work on a no-ip. Ive done everything portforward, and everything, but when i would see if the port 43594 would work on my ip or w/e it thing would say connection timed out? Then also i had someone say that people cannot connect to your server if you use compile.. he said just straight up open runserver and then people can connect? But when i try to open my runserver it opens really fast and then closes. Ive been using the compiler and hit r to runserver but he said no one can connect like that?
-- WTF is going on and happening?

item.title: Do you need runserver or compile? also connection help
item.dc:creator: @w00tz0r_pwnz w00tz0r pwnz
item.description:
@w00tz0r_pwnz wrote:

[quote=“cody123, post:5, topic:117797”]Well i downloded project destiny from the download section but when i start runserver it says server started on icescape?[/quote] Project Destiny is the same thing as icescape its basically the same project with a different name. Don’t use it though i dont trust the guy that made it because of “secret issues”.

Read full topic
item.source: Do you need runserver or compile? also connection help

but were using testscape atm and im going to code that real good soo its perfekto

but not sure on the icescape thing but…have u compiled befor running?
